item.title: Dr Lance O'Sullivan labelled a town's lockdown efforts 'a joke'. Then he went kayaking - 'I'm a dick'
item.description:
A Northland doctor and former New Zealander of the Year has admitted to flouting lockdown rules to go kayaking.
Lance O'Sullivan, who earlier this month blasted Kaitaia's lockdown efforts as "a joke" ...

item.title: First photos: Security escorts Kiwis in quarantine to get a breath of fresh air
item.description:
Kiwis in 14-day quarantine are being given a breath of fresh air under the watchful eye of aviation security officers each day - as they escort them for exercise in central Auckland.
About 1000 New ...
item.author: newsfeeds@nzherald.co.nz

enclosure.url: https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202017/walkies11_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=Those without Covid-19 symptoms in assisted isolation can leave their rooms for fresh air. Photo / Michael Craig
